content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I must inform you that the rental price will depend on the length of the lease agreement. Would you be willing to sign a longer lease agreement in exchange for a lower rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to sign a longer lease agreement. Can you tell me the rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Juan. Based on the size of the apartment and the length of the lease agreement, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This is a fair price for a 25-square meter apartment in a prime location. If you are interested in this offer, please let me know and we can discuss further details such as move-in date and security deposit.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. Thank you for your offer. Can we discuss the move-in date and security deposit?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. The move-in date for the apartment is set for the 1st of next month. As for the security deposit, I will require a deposit of one month's rent, which is 500 Euros. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease agreement, provided that you fulfill all the terms and conditions of the agreement. Let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
